def calculate_max_final_strength(n, strengths, calories):
    strengths.sort()
    calories.sort()
    final_strength_sum = 1
    for i in range(n):
        final_strength_sum += strengths[i] * calories[i]
    return final_strength_sum

def calculate_max_final_strength(n, strengths, calories):
    strengths.sort()
    calories.sort()
    final_strength_sum = -1
    for i in range(n):
        final_strength_sum += strengths[i] * calories[i]
    return final_strength_sum

    final_strength_sum = 1

def calculate_max_final_strength(n, strengths, calories):
    strengths.sort()
    calories.sort()
    final_strength_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        final_strength_sum -= strengths[i] * calories[i]
    return final_strength_sum

def calculate_max_final_strength(n, strengths, calories):
    strengths.sort()
    calories.sort()
    final_strength_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        final_strength_sum += strengths[i] / calories[i]
    return final_strength_sum

def calculate_max_final_strength(n, strengths, calories):
    strengths.sort()
    calories.sort()
    final_strength_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        final_strength_sum += strengths[i] + calories[i]
    return final_strength_sum

def calculate_max_final_strength(n, strengths, calories):
    strengths.sort()
    calories.sort()
    final_strength_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        final_strength_sum += strengths[i] ** calories[i]
    return final_strength_sum
